definition[0]: a unit for measuring an amount of liquid, especially beer or milk. In Britain a pint is equal to 0.568 litres, and in the US it is equal to 0.473 litres
example[0]: a pint glass  (=a glass which will hold a pint of liquid)
example[1]: Add two pints of water to the mixture.
definition[1]: a pint of beer, especially one that you drink in a bar
example[3]: Heâ€™s gone down the pub for a quick pint.
